Font Families

Community-driven font collection designed for user agency and independence. Fork-first architecture means you own your fonts completely.

Browse Fonts Our Approach

Quick Start

CSS Integration

@font-face {
  font-family: 'Aspekta';
  src: url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/hund-press/font-families@v1.2.0/aspekta/fonts/webfonts/Aspekta-400.woff2') format('woff2');
  font-weight: 400;
  font-display: swap;
}

body {
  font-family: 'Aspekta', system-ui, sans-serif;
}

HTML Preload

<link rel="preload" 
      href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/hund-press/font-families@v1.2.0/aspekta/fonts/webfonts/Aspekta-400.woff2" 
      as="font" 
      type="font/woff2" 
      crossorigin>

User Agency First

This font collection embodies a different approach to web tools—one that prioritizes your independence over platform engagement. Every decision is made to increase your ownership and understanding, not to create dependencies.

Fork-First Architecture

Complete ownership through repository forking. Your font collection becomes truly yours, with all tools included.

Minimal Dependencies

Clean, readable code you can understand and modify. No abstract systems hiding implementation details.

Standards-Based

Uses web standards with educational examples. Every generated CSS teaches best practices through working code.

Community Over Commerce

Built outside enterprise constraints, making decisions based purely on what serves individual creators.

True Independence Through Forking

Rather than asking you to contribute to our collection, we encourage you to create your own. This embodies our core belief: you should own your creative tools, not just use them.

Complete Ownership

Your fork is yours forever. Host it anywhere, modify anything, no permission needed.

All Tools Included

Font processing, subset generation, and catalog building—everything travels with your fork.

Educational by Design

Every piece of generated code teaches web standards and best practices through working examples.

To create your own collection: Fork this repository, add your fonts, run npm run build. That's it—you have a complete font platform that works independently of ours.
